thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: John Oliver took a few more shots at FIFA and Sepp Blatter last night
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: John Oliver took a few more shots at FIFA and Sepp Blatter last night - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Man-Cave | Watch: John Oliver took a few more shots at FIFA and Sepp Blatter last night
text:
As we've said already , last night's episode of John Oliver's Last Week Tonight was pretty great.
There was a 20 minute segment on North Dakota and oil which we highly recommend , but unfortunately that took up a bit too much time, which left just three minutes to deal with the most recent FIFA scandal.
How many jokes about corruption can you fit into three minutes? If you're John Oliver, a lot.
MORE: Watch: John Oliver takes on predatory churches and televangelists
MORE: Watch: John Oliver tears apart America's mental health system on Last Week Tonight
MORE: Watch: John Oliver's list of things school kids won't learn this year
